name: Baxton_Studio_Eris_Black_or_White_Faux_Leather_Button-tufting_Sofa_Twin_Daybed_with_Roll-out_Trundle_Bed
reviews: I am really happy with purchase. For the price, it can't be beaten. It is very contemporary. It is sturdy, easy to assemble, and looks great overall.
description: The Eris Modern and Contemporary Faux Leather Button-tufting Sofa Twin Daybed with Roll-out Trundle Guest Bed can accommodate up to two overnight guests.  It's a sofa!  It's a bed!  Yet another bed!  Constructed from CARB-compliant solid hardwood and boasting beautiful button-tufting and grid lines, it's fully upholstered in black or white faux leather with foam padding. MaterialFaux Leather, Foam, MDF, RubberwoodFinishBlack Finish, White FinishBed StyleDaybed, Trundle BedAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlack, WhiteFurniture PatternSolid
